original_text:
Surely I would wear it on my shoulder,
    I would put it on like a crown.
korean_text: 내가 그것을 어깨에 메기도 하고 왕관처럼 머리에 쓰기도 하리라

sentences.original_text: Surely I would wear it on my shoulder
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 나는 그것을 내 어깨에 걸겠다

sentences.original_text: I would put it on like a crown
